ai-ja201:1.1_0: “The wise say that shackle is not strong
ai-ja201:1.2_0: that’s made of iron, wood, or knots.
ai-ja201:1.3_0: But they’re obsessed with jeweled earrings,
ai-ja201:1.4_0: concerned for their partners and children.
ai-ja201:2.3_0: The wise proceed, having cut this one too,
ai-ja201:2.4_0: unconcerned, having given up sensual pleasures.”
